attributes.action: Bassist Mark King should be knighted for services to British Music since 1979
attributes.background: Mark King has been a world-class bassist since his British band were formed. He has engaged in much charity work and promoted the British music industry across the world.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
